title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2721/98 of 16 December 1998 fixing the minimum selling prices for beef put up for sale under the invitation to tender referred to in Regulation (EC) No 2607/98
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2721/98 of 16 December 1998 fixing the minimum selling prices for beef put up for sale under the invitation to tender referred to in Regulation (EC) No 2607/98
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The minimum selling prices for beef for the invitation to tender held in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 2607/98 for which the time limit for the submission of tenders was 7 December 1998 are as set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 17 December 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24.
(2) OJ L 210, 28. 7. 1998, p. 17.
(3) OJ L 328, 4. 12. 1998, p. 12.
(4) OJ L 251, 5. 10. 1979, p. 12.
(5) OJ L 248, 14. 10. 1995, p. 39.
